data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Kayanza unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kayanza, Burundi
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Kayanza. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Kayanza words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, there are 307,838 people in the state of Kayanza who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Swahili people.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Kayanza.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Kayanza who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kayanza, Burundi has a population of 486,900.

We estimate Kayanza has 146,887 people who might know Jesus, 307,838 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 32,175 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Kayanza who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
